content: हिंस् {c1c} {c7c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (हिंसति, हिनस्ति, हिंसयति-ते, हिंसित) {@--1@} To strike, hit. {@--2@} To hurt, injure, harm; <ls>Pt. 1. 307.</ls> {@--3@} To afflict, torment; <ls>Māl. 2. 1.</ls> {@--4@} To kill, slay, destroy completely; कीर्ति सूते दुष्कृतं या हिनस्ति <ls>U. 5. 31</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 45</ls>; <ls>Bg. 13. 28</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 38</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">14. 57</ls>, <ls n="Bk.">15. 78.</ls>
